chunks.zh: V 友们是每天都刮胡子么，有个想法，大家觉得怎么样？
chunks.en: Do you V friends shave every day? I have an idea, what do you think?

chunks.zh:
个人胡子长的特别快，每天早上都要刮，感觉很麻烦，刮胡刀，时间都是成本。
考虑要不要去直接激光脱毛，这样一劳永逸，有没有研究过的老哥，听说韩国那边很多男的都这样。
chunks.en:
My beard grows very fast, and I have to shave every morning, which is annoying. Razors and time are both costs.
I'm considering whether to go for laser hair removal directly, so it's done once and for all. Has anyone studied this? I heard that many men in Korea do this.

chunks.zh: 准奏
chunks.en: Granted.

chunks.zh: 不喜欢妖里妖气，有一点胡子也帅也可能是因为本人帅
chunks.en: I don't like effeminate looks. Having a little beard is also handsome, maybe because I'm handsome myself.

chunks.zh: 我可以每天刮，但不能不长
chunks.en: I can shave every day, but it can't not grow.

chunks.zh: 2025 年了怎么还有人觉得某种东西是某种人的象征？
chunks.en: It's 2025, why are there still people who think that something is a symbol of a certain type of person?

chunks.zh: 每天都要刷牙, 好麻烦, 我突然有个想法, 大家觉得怎么样
chunks.en: I have to brush my teeth every day, it's so annoying. I suddenly have an idea, what do you all think?

chunks.zh: 留一阵子再刮，让老板感觉每天为了公司操碎心
chunks.en: Let it grow for a while before shaving, so the boss feels like you're racking your brains for the company every day.

chunks.zh: 我一个女性朋友和她男朋友的对话：女：我买了个激光脱毛仪，弄得很干净还不疼，你要不要试试男：好啊好啊，我们每天都要刮胡子，还刮不干净，正好试试你这个女：那你太适合了，我这个脱掉就不长了，很方便男：什么，再也不会长了？？那不用了，不长胡子不是太监吗女：不是永远不会长，是几个月内不会再长男：哦那可以所以这就是男人对胡子的心态，我希望它别长，但我不能接受它永远不长
chunks.en: A conversation between a female friend of mine and her boyfriend: Female: I bought a laser hair removal device, it's very clean and doesn't hurt, do you want to try it? Male: Okay, okay, we have to shave every day, and it's not clean, I'll just try yours Female: Then you are so suitable, it will not grow after I remove it, it is very convenient Male: What, it will never grow again?? Then no, isn't it an eunuch if you don't grow a beard Female: It won't grow forever, it won't grow again in a few months Male: Oh that's okay So this is the mentality of men towards beards, I hope it doesn't grow, but I can't accept that it will never grow.

chunks.zh: 这些男的都是清朝过来的吗？什么年代了还认为男人没胡子是太监？
chunks.en: Are these men from the Qing Dynasty? What era is it, and they still think that a man without a beard is an eunuch?

chunks.zh: 不如嘎了
chunks.en: Why not just cut it off?

chunks.zh: 我点开并且认真看了一会头像
chunks.en: I clicked on and seriously looked at your profile picture for a while.

chunks.zh: 割以永治  /dog
chunks.en: Castration solves all problems /dog

chunks.zh: @weixind 人家可能根本不鸟你
chunks.en: @weixind They probably don't even care about you.

chunks.zh: 我在成都，我朋友说我留胡子像🐻，吓得我每天刮胡子
chunks.en: I'm in Chengdu, and my friend said that I look like a bear when I have a beard, so I'm so scared that I shave every day.

chunks.zh: 我胡子半天就长了 习惯了每天都刮，五分钟完事
chunks.en: My beard grows in half a day. I'm used to shaving every day, and it's done in five minutes.

chunks.zh: 每天早上三分钟。男人就有男人的样子，年龄大了，后面想留胡子怎么办
chunks.en: Three minutes every morning. Men should look like men. What if you want to grow a beard when you're older?

chunks.zh: 正在脱。
chunks.en: Currently removing hair.

chunks.zh: 省下来的时间多当会牛马吗。年纪大了想留性感小胡子可就没后悔药了。
chunks.en: Are you just going to be a workhorse for a little longer with the time you save? If you want to grow a sexy little mustache when you're older, there's no turning back.

chunks.zh: 一般晚上洗澡的同时顺便刮了，不占多少时间
chunks.en: I usually shave while taking a shower at night, which doesn't take much time.

chunks.zh: 激光不贵么？够买多少刀头了。
chunks.en: Isn't laser expensive? How many razor blades could you buy?

chunks.zh: 不喜欢做男娘，我觉得有胡子挺好的，男人的象征
chunks.en: I don't like being a 'man-woman'. I think having a beard is good, it's a symbol of manhood.
